input.sentences: we took a trip to see the waterfalls .
the view was amazing from where we were .
you could feel the mist from the falls from where we were standing .
the water falls could be seen from miles away .
once we got closer to the water falls we seen a lot of wildlife | including this butterfly .
output.sentences: Today we took a trip to the waterfalls and we climbed up to the very top.
Looking down, we could see the clouds of mist obscuring the bottom of the falls.
The sound of the falling water was loud even though we were far away.
A beautiful butterfly landed next to me and stayed for a while, like it was enjoying the view along with me.
